org.fcrepo.server.security.xacml.pep.rest.filters

Class AbstractFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.server.security.xacml.pep.rest.filters.AbstractFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RESTFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddDatastream, AddRelationship, BasicRISearchFilter, ControlFilter, DescribeFilter, Export, FindObjects, GetDatastream, GetDatastreamDissemination, GetDatastreamHistory, GetDissemination, GetFilter, GetNextPID, GetNextPIDFilter, GetObjectHistory, GetObjectHistoryFilter, GetObjectProfile, GetObjectXML, GetRelationships, Ingest, ListDatastreams, ListDatastreamsFilter, ListMethods, ListMethodsFilter, ModifyDatastream, ModifyObject, NoopFilter, PurgeDatastream, PurgeObject, PurgeRelationship, RISearchFilter, SetDatastreamState, SetDatastreamVersionable, UploadFilter, Validate

    public abstract class AbstractFilter
extends Object
implements RESTFilter
    This is the AbstractFilter class which provides generic functionality for all REST filters. All REST filters should extend this class.
    Author:
    nishen@melcoe.mq.edu.au

      Constructors

      AbstractFilter()
      Default constructor obtains an instance of the Context Handler.

                                                                      throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Creates a list of Subjects from a servlet request. If no subject is found a subject called 'anonymous' is created.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request
        Returns:
        a list of Subjects
